Author: setniessesed
Text: Same. I suspect it's either the stress of being around my parents or the surveillance of my eating/them pushing their own eating habits onto me. It sucks. I always want to tell them I have strict rules for eating that really mess me up if they're interrupted but I also mess up by myself too occasionally so then I feel like a jackass (like refusing a small cookie one day since it doesn't fit in the calories for the day but then bingeing on a whole loaf of bread the next day lmao)   Glad you aren't purging though, that's great.
